name: Primeval Planet: Angimanation
description:
Game Preview: https://youtu.be/vRhzODeDvM8

Explore the darkest corner of the nightmare world, Kambria as the powerful and sexy Ava Liberty, a member of Angimanation, the well equipped scout squad.

Angimanation is a horror survival eroge with a rich world background. It includes:
- 60 areas and more than one hundred custom scripted events!
- Two base endings, two additional endings, and one extra secret ending waiting for you to discover!
- A complex conflict between several powerful forces, creating a story of love and hatred...

Within Our Game Universe:
- Health points, armor, pregnancy status, poison, immunity and Ava's overall horniness... only a survivalist that can master Ava's body and carefully manage their inventory will have any chance of survival.
- Destroy your enemy with different bullets and weapons, but value stealth and tact!
- An item crafting system that will help resourceful players maximize efficiency!
- A common erotic item that is useful, but dangerous!

Be warned, the hentai creeps are coming, and they're bringing monsters, insects, and giant, horrific mutants!
A swarm of horny, erotic creatures are invading, and there's no way to escape!

Beware, or Ava will wind up tied like breeding livestock, strapped to a milking machine!
